text: In order for a property to be eligible for a tax abatement under § 47-858.03 or § 47-858.04, an owner must:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-114, see notes following § 47-857.01.

DC CODE § 47-858.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Submit an application to the Mayor requesting certification of the property and rehabilitation as eligible for the tax abatement; and
Receive the Mayor's certification of the application and the tax abatement.
